post:
Hello,

After the launch of VPS in Singapore few weeks ago, we are now please to announce the release of **OVH VPS in SYDNEY** !

Price start at 6$AU (5$US) for 1vCore 3.5Ghz – 1GB RAM – 30 GB local SSD – 100Mbps – 1TB quota included

The complete range can be found here : https://www.ovh.com.au/vps/#ssd-discover
You can order here : http://ovh.to/YqwaCB

This is a special offer and come with some limitations : we will not offer optional automated backup nor snapshot and additional volume will not be available.

Also, the quota can't be upgraded. The only way to get more bw quota is to upgrade your VPS to the next one. No unlimited quota option will be offered.

Those VPS come with 1 IPv4 and 1 IPv6. You can order up-to 16 IPs, localised in Autralia. 

If you have any questions, please go ahead and ask :)

Enjoy !
